page.title: 14THE L.B.G
page.content:
{ The LBG is about 80 years old and it sells everything for the market gardener.A committee administers and owns the LBG. It opens at 8.30-1.00 then opens in the afternoon at 2.00-4.00 and on Saturday it opens at 8.30-12.00. Farmers,gardeners and people use the items they sell.The LBG employs 80 people at the main branch at Blackminster but one is employed in Welford.The LBG set up business in Welford because it was surrounded by market gardens and farms so they would make a profit from transporting goods to market and selling all the goods gardeners and farmers need.
by GLENN & MARK
